prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with sleek purple scales and vibrant pink accents.
I want a legendary Pokemon that towers over others with its majestic wings and sharp features.
Generate a mythical creature that embodies both elegance and power, featuring unique color patterns.
Make a Pokemon with a serpentine body, dark colors, and a fierce expression that intimidates foes.
Imagine a rare Pokemon that blends into its forest environment, showcasing vibrant yet stealthy colors.
Design a creature that can soar through the skies, with a streamlined body and striking visual traits.
Show me a Pokemon that has a balance of agility and strength, with a unique blend of colors.

distinctive_features: Elegant tail with a pointed end
